document_title: Twin-to-twin transfusion syndrome: Causes, signs and treatment
subsection_name: truyen-mau-song-thai.json_3_Subjects at high risk of disease
subsection_content: This syndrome is the most common complication in amniotic twins sharing the same placenta; Therefore, pregnant women with multiple pregnancies with one placenta are the easiest candidates. The disease can be detected early with ultrasound; Therefore, pregnant women carrying twins need regular prenatal check-ups to control the size and health status of the fetus. (4)
subsection_title: truyen mau song thai.json. Subjects at high risk of disease
subsection_data:
truyen mau song thai.json. Subjects at high risk of disease
This syndrome is the most common complication in amniotic twins sharing the same placenta; Therefore, pregnant women with multiple pregnancies with one placenta are the easiest candidates. The disease can be detected early with ultrasound; Therefore, pregnant women carrying twins need regular prenatal check-ups to control the size and health status of the fetus. (4)
